summary: Completed comprehensive testing of JobHub MVP application flow. Backend APIs fully functional (14/14 tests passed). Frontend authentication and core functionality working correctly when using valid credentials. Successfully tested complete user journey from signup to application tracking.

ui_bugs.issue: Frontend signup form not properly creating users - users created via signup form cannot login

integration_issues.issue: Users created through frontend signup form are not properly stored or cannot authenticate - API signup works but frontend signup fails

issues: HTML validation warnings in console - nested div inside p tags in JobCard component

passed_tests: Backend API health check (14/14 tests passed)
Login form works with valid API-created credentials
Jobs page displays 15 jobs with Apply buttons
Apply Now button creates applications successfully
Applications appear in tracker kanban board
Tracker page shows applications in correct columns
Protected routes work correctly when authenticated
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend signup form - users created through the signup form cannot login, while API signup works correctly. The issue appears to be in the frontend signup process not properly handling the response or storing authentication state. Users can login successfully with API-created credentials, confirming the backend works correctly.
